root.name: No Respect
root.description: You take control of an heavily armed futuristic hovercraft and fight your way through a ladder of opponents in 20 huge arenas. The game also has an 8 player deathmatch mode over LAN or the Internet (using Kali software, which was bundled with the game).It's most notable feature was the early version of the polygon/voxel hybrid engine that would later be used in Appeal's famous Outcast.
